## NgwWebmapAdapterOptions.defaultBasemap property

Add baselayer from OsmLayerAdapter if no \[webmap\_resource\].basemap\_webmap has been set.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
defaultBasemap?: boolean;
```
